span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 使适应： to change (something) so as to make it suitable for a new use or situation
【例】 acclimate oneself to a nine-to-five office job 适应朝九晚五的坐班生活
【近】 adjust, accommodate, shape, suit, tailor
【反】 make unfamiliar with 使不熟悉

【记】 ac 肯定 + climate 气候，能适应气候
